## Municipalities

```{r municipality_map}
library(gisfin)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

municipalities <- get_municipalities(year = 2019)
ggplot(municipalities) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = as.integer(kunta)))
```

## Zipcodes


```{r zipcode_map}
zipcodes <- get_zipcodes(year = 2019) 
ggplot(zipcodes) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = as.integer(posti_alue)))
```
